sqlMap.insert: insert into qna (qna_no, qna_title, qna_ques_content, qna_ans_content, qna_active, course_no, sutudent_no) values (qna_no_seq.nextval, #title#, #quesContent#, #ansContent#, #active#, #course.no#, #student.no#)
sqlMap.select: select A.qna_no as no, A.qna_title as title, A.qna_ques_content as quesContent, A.qna_ques_date as quesDate, A.qna_ans_content as ansContent, A.qna_ans_regdate as ansRegdate, A.qna_active as active, A.course_no as "course.no", A.student_no as "student.no" from qna A, student B where A.student_no = B.student_no order by qna_no desc

select A.qna_no as no, A.qna_title as title, A.qna_ques_content as quesContent, A.qna_ques_date as quesDate, A.qna_ans_content as ansContent, A.qna_ans_regdate as ansRegdate, A.qna_active as active, A.course_no as "course.no", A.student_no as "student.no", B.course_name as "course.name", C.lecturer_name as "course.lecturer.name" from qna A, course B, lecturer C where A.course_no = B.course_no and B.lecturer_no = C.lecturer_no and A.qna_no = #value#
